mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.phone_number, u.password, u.full_name, u.tax_code, u.address_1, u.address_2, u.address_3, u.address_4, u.address_5, u.city, u.location_code, u.bank_name, u.bank_number, u.description, u.role_id, r.role_name, u.is_active FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON u.role_id = r.id WHERE u.user_id = #{id}
